c74object.name: sp.clustercreate
c74object.digest: Create clusters based on input analysis
c74object.description: Create clusters based on input analysis.
c74object.discussion: Open the Overview Patch The sp.classcreate object will create classes by either automatically clustering the dataset contents based on the amount of clusters you request or by manually seeding specific clusters.

inlet.description: Incoming buffer~ of descriptors to analyze for cluster matching. Also takes the messages for object control.

outlet.description: Dict output for displaying on an sp.plotter.
Total amount of entries that have been sent to the clustering algorithm.
Training loss value for the neural network.

method.name: clusters
method.description: The amount of clusters to find in the current training data.

method.name: print
method.digest: Print dataset contents to Max console
method.description: Prints a summary of the descriptors in the dataset to the Max console.

method.name: seed
method.description: Enables the seeding of clusters instead of specifying an amount of cluster.

method.name: trainmlp
method.digest: Sets the training state of the neural network
method.description: Sets the training state of the neural network. A '1' will begin training the network, and a '0' will complete the training.

method.name: write
method.description: Write a .json file with all the descriptors and cluster labels to disk.
